movies.title: Neberte nám princeznú
movies.plot: Modern version of Snowhite fairytale. Girl Katka is frustrated and restless. She escapes from home and find herself in the orphanage. Seven orphan boys hide her and call her "Princess". But Katka is soon uncovered and her frantic mother is on the way...
movies.simplePlot: Modern version of Snowhite fairytale. Girl Katka is frustrated and restless. She escapes from home and find herself in the orphanage. Seven orphan boys hide her and call her "Princess". But...

biography.bio: Marika Gombitová was born on September 12, 1956 in Kosice, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Neberte nám princeznú (1981), The Seven Ravens (2015) and Atelier Duse (1987).
biography.name: Marika Gombitová

biography.placeOfBirth: Moravská Ostrava, Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia [now Ostrava, Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Marie Rottrová was born on November 13, 1941 in Moravská Ostrava, Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia. She is an actress, known for Three Brothers (2014), Neberte nám princeznú (1981) and Women in Temptation (2010).
biography.name: Marie Rottrová

biography.bio: Miroslav Zbirka was born on October 21, 1952 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Miroslav Zbirka

biography.bio: Ludek Sobota was born on May 27, 1943 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor and writer, known for Joachim, Put It in the Machine (1974), Jeste vetsí blbec, nez jsme doufali (1994) and Nebát se a nakrást (1999).
biography.name: Ludek Sobota

biography.bio: Matús Cinzer is an actor, known for Neberte nám princeznú (1981).
biography.name: Matús Cinzer

biography.bio: Daniel Hassan is an actor, known for Neberte nám princeznú (1981).
biography.name: Daniel Hassan

biography.bio: Roman Hása is an actor, known for Neberte nám princeznú (1981).
biography.name: Roman Hása

biography.bio: Jani Kovacic is a composer and actor, known for Ovni in mamuti (1985), Technology to the People (2015) and Neberte nám princeznú (1981).
biography.name: Jani Kovacic

biography.bio: Ludovít Toth is an actor, known for Neberte nám princeznú (1981), King Thrushbeard (1984) and Klúce od mesta (1983).
biography.name: Ludovít Toth

biography.bio: Jozef Vrábel is an actor, known for Neberte nám princeznú (1981), Tajomny Ostrov (1984) and Materské znamienko (1985).
biography.name: Jozef Vrábel

biography.bio: Michal Vrábel is an actor, known for Neberte nám princeznú (1981).
biography.name: Michal Vrábel

biography.bio: K. Brichcí is an actor, known for Neberte nám princeznú (1981).
biography.name: K. Brichcí

biography.bio: J. Cízková is an actress, known for Neberte nám princeznú (1981).
biography.name: J. Cízková

biography.bio: Viera Hladká was born on April 30, 1943. She is an actress, known for Výlet do mladosti (1984), The Case of the Dissolute Beauty (1974) and The Assistant (1982).
biography.name: Viera Hladká

biography.bio: Mária Hájková was born on January 18, 1920. She was an actress, known for Spadla z oblakov (1978), Angel in the Mountains (1955) and Ghosts of the Dormers (1988). She died on May 28, 1989.
biography.name: Mária Hájková
